item.title: Hello, Hugo.
item.description: 2019— Time for a new beginning If you’ve read any of my previous blog posts over the years, you’ve likely noticed that I post infrequently and change platforms about as often— and there are several reasons for that. I change platforms to learn something new. The last iteration of this blog was self-hosted in my townhome, on Ghost, on a Raspberry Pi. It was an interesting— and successful— experiment to learn how to manage that infrastructure top to bottom from creating content to managing the application, to networking and DNS, all the way down to hardware.
